version_description:
We have made some improvements and bug fixes.
If you have feedback, let us know. New features and more levels are coming soon!

We have fixed a progression blocking bug.
This update includes new improvements and fixes as well. If you have feedback, let us know.
And stay tuned: new features and more levels are coming soon!

This update includes new improvements and fixes as well. If you have feedback, let us know.

Stars can be earned now one after the other!

We’re always working on Tintin Match to ensure you get the best experience possible. See the new changes below and update your app to see how the latest version improves it:

This update includes new improvements and fixes as well. If you have feedback, let us know.
And stay tuned: new features and more levels are coming soon!

We really value your questions and feedback. Get support in-app or email us anytime at help@tintinmatch.comand we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!
